product_name: adidas Terrex Swift Softshell Vest - Women's - 2013 Overstock
long_description: You'll be surprised how often you'll wear the women's adidas Terrex Swift Softshell Vest. It's breathable and stretchy and protects your core from wind and light precip as you run or hike. Double-weave polyester/spandex soft-shell fabric offers excellent breathability and stretch. Durable water repellent finish sheds snow and light rain. Quick drying. Women's adidas Terrex Swift Softshell Vest has zippered hand pockets. Overstock.
short_description: You'll be surprised how often you'll wear the women's adidas Terrex Swift Softshell Vest. It's breathable and stretchy and protects your core from wind and light precip as you run or hike.
